transArray.content: not bad. Clean and hygienic. Quite unique. Toiletries and the like are all orange-flavored.

The night with stars will not be dark, the sea with sky will be blue, the life with dreams will be full of sunshine, and with your days, our work will be more meaningful. Thank you, guest, for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for recognizing our room hygiene and toiletries. Your affirmation is the greatest encouragement for our work. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay experience. Our Toiletries are all sold through a unified online platform, and the patented design avoids secondary canning. We are deeply gratified to receive your love. All hotel staff look forward to every encounter with you, and wish you success in your work! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
